context: In 2025, Arista expanded AI-driven campus and branch networking offerings and acquired VeloCloud SD-WAN portfolio from Broadcom (July 2025). Company faces challenges from high operating costs (Q3 expenses up 36% to $512M) and supply bottlenecks for advanced products. Positioned as leader in scalable high-performance, ultra-low-latency networks for data centers and cloud computing. Unified software stack (EOS) across WAN routing, campus, and data center sets company apart from competitors.
